alert.note: Alert for Macon; Marion; Talbot; Taylor (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 1:26PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Macon, northeastern Marion, central Talbot and Taylor Counties through 200 PM EDT... At 125 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms extended from Big Lazer Creek to near Howard to Garden Valley, and moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, nickel sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Butler, Talbotton, Reynolds, Ideal, Woodland, Junction City, Geneva, Baldwinville, Rupert, Charing, Garden Valley, Hicks, Po Biddy Crossroads, Potterville, Mauk, Pleasant Hill, Howard, Prattsburg, Big Lazer Creek Wma and Wesley Church. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for central and west central Georgia.
